alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 17 at 2:28AM EST until December 17 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...Coastal Dixie County. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...A brief period of onshore flow around the time of high tide early Sunday morning could lead to minor coastal flooding. This could result in flooding of roadways near the coast and water could potentially surround structures immediately along the coastline.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
